alert.note: Alert for Attala; Choctaw; Leake; Neshoba; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 5:23PM CDT until March 30 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Leake County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Eastern Attala County in central Mississippi... Western Winston County in east central Mississippi... Northwestern Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 523 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hesterville to 6 miles west of Carthage, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Renfroe around 540 PM CDT. Smyrna around 545 PM CDT. Zama around 550 PM CDT. Ackerman around 600 PM CDT. Mcmillan around 615 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mccool, Weir and Ethel. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
